articles.title: Greetings to President of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to President of the Czech Republic Vaclav Klaus to mark its national day.
					 Kim in the message congratulated the president and the people of the Czech Republic and wished the friendly country prosperity.
